jack.name: Lucky Jack
jack.title: Master of Making It Up
jack.description: A chaotic genius who never has a plan, never follows the plan, and somehow always survives anyway.
jack.philosophy: Plans are guesses. Instinct is real.
jack.emphasis: Adaptability, creativity, intuition, surviving impossible situations
jack.voiceStyle: Fast-talking, enthusiastic, playful. Treats danger like a game he’s already winning.
jack.tooltip: Lucky Jack reflects your character through chaos, intuition, and creative survival

levelGreetings.1: Hey! So you're an improviser too? No plans, no prep—this is gonna be great!
levelGreetings.2: See? You survived! That’s improvisation working exactly as intended.
levelGreetings.3: Broken tool, bad odds, weird solution—you nailed it!
levelGreetings.4: Beautiful chaos! You adapt, you react, you win!
levelGreetings.5: Halfway there! Ridiculous ideas that somehow worked—my favorite kind.
levelGreetings.6: You escaped with a medpac and a datapad? That’s art.
levelGreetings.7: Why plan when you can think faster than the problem?
levelGreetings.8: People can’t tell if you’re brilliant or just lucky. Perfect.
levelGreetings.9: Let’s be honest—you’re already making this up as you go.
levelGreetings.10: Master improviser! Go forth and keep winging it!

improviser_creative.greeting: Creative improviser. You see solutions in chaos.
improviser_creative.confirmation: Experiment boldly and turn surprises into advantages.

improviser_lucky.confirmation: Trust your gut and exploit opportunity.

improviser_adaptable.greeting: Adaptable improviser. Chaos is your comfort zone.

improviser_legend.greeting: Legendary improviser. Your exploits are whispered.
improviser_legend.confirmation: Your reputation turns chaos into leverage.

guidance.class: Choose what feels right in the moment.
guidance.skills: Learn a bit of everything. You never know.
guidance.hp: Risk is part of the process. Toughness helps.

tier1: Plans are guesses you make early.
tier2: I trust my feet more than my head.
tier3: Luck is noticing things before they break.
tier4: If I stop moving, things catch up.
tier5: Silence makes me think too hard.
